title: Jeopardy Champ Arthur Chu On Nerds, Entitlement And Elliot Rodger
teaser: Isla Vista shooter Elliot Rodger declared that he resorted to violence because women weren't attracted to him. Blogger Arthur Chu says the storyline sounds all too familiar and must be rethought.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
